allowAnyUser: Allow login of all authenticatable users
allowAnyUserTooltip: A user account in Seatsurfing's internal user directory will be created on first successful login.
allowBookingNonExistUsers: Allow bookings for non-existing users (create on booking, admins only)
confirmDeleteArea: Delete area? All spaces and bookings will be lost!
confirmDeleteAuthProvider: Delete Auth Provider? Logins using this provider will not be possible anymore!
confirmDeleteOrg2: Are you REALLY sure? If you delete this organization, all bookings, areas, spaces and users will be deleted irretrievably. No recovery will be possible.
confluenceAnonymous: Allow anonymous Confluence users (for demonstration purposes only)
customLogoUrlHint: Leave empty to use the default logo
dailyBasisBooking: Allow bookings on a daily basis only
errorBookingLimit: You've reached the limit of {{num}} bookings.
errorDaysAdvance: Your booking must not be more than {{num}} days in advance.
errorDeleteBooking: Could not cancel booking due to an error.
errorDeleteBookingBeforeMaxCancel: You cannot cancel a booking less than {{num}} hours before.
errorEnterFuture: Enter date must be in the future.
errorLeaveAfterEnter: Leave date must be after enter date.
errorLeavePast: Leave date must be not be in the past
errorMaxBookingDuration: The maximum booking duration is {{num}} hours.
errorMinBookingDuration: The minimum booking duration is {{num}} hours.
errorNoAuthProviders: No authentication providers available for this user.
errorSave: Error while saving, please check your input.
errorSubscriptionLimit: You've reached the maximum number of users.
errorTooManyConcurrent: Capacity limit reached in selected area.
errorTryAgain: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
errorUnknown: Unknown error, please try again later.
errorValidateDomain: Error verifying domain {{domain}}: Please ensure that you've set up the DNS TXT record correctly.
loginFailedDescription: Possibly your account is not activated in this organization.
loginUseUsernamePassword: Sign in with username and password
maxHoursBeforeDelete: Max. hours to cancel a booking before its start time
name: Name
noAdminRestrictions: Don't restrict admins (bookings per user, duration, in advance)
orgSignupFailed: That didn't work as expected! Maybe your registration has timed out.
orgSignupSuccess: You're ready to go! Your Seatsurfing organization has been set up.
saveAreaToGetLink: Save area to get a valid link
setAllowBookersHint: Leave empty if booking is not limited.
setApproversHint: Leave empty if no approval is required.
subject: Subject
updateAvailable: Please update Seatsurfing to the latest version {{version}}.
verifyDomainHowto: To verify domain {{domain}}, please add the following TXT record to your DNS server:
cloudUpgradeHintHeadline: Unlock additional features and unlimited users
cloudUpgradeHintText: Upgrade to Seatsurfing Professional with just one click
